comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: I'm wondering if we could get rid of some of those configuration files. The preferred approach would be to reuse the default repository.xml in jackrabbit-core as much as possible.

component: jackrabbit-core, jackrabbit-jca, jackrabbit-ocm, jackrabbit-ocm-nodemanagement, jackrabbit-spi2jcr, jackrabbit-standalone
description:
Some components still reference old version of the repository-1.x.dtd.
All components should be upgraded to repository-1.6.dtd
